carpet.rule.maxPlayerBotCap.desc: Controls how many bots can player spawn without [carpet.unlimitedBots] permission.
carpet.rule.maxPlayerBotGlobalCap.desc: Controls how many bots can be spawned without [carpet.ignoreGlobalBotCap] permission.
carpet.rule.updateSuppressionMessageRang: Makes update suppression message display locally in range.
carpet.rule.clUseCarpetMessageFormat.des: Whether or not Carpet Lantern will use Messenger.m() or source.sendFeedback(if false)
carpet.rule.playerCommandBlockBotVerific: If the BlockBot is installed on the server, it doesn't allow non-ops to spawn a fake player with the name of a whitelisted player.
